/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and creating a lens flare that adds a touch of whimsy to the image.
